column4: i'm trying to set up my kyocera fs-1128mfp printer via network. if i print small files it works just fine, but if i try to print this 3.7mb pdf the printer errors and the attention light starts blinking
anyone know what might be going on?
how much cache does the printer have?
when i print to that same file to the same printer from a windows machine it seems to work just fine.
